title: Rachel allen's chicken liver pâté with tomato salad
ingredients: ['250g (9oz) chicken livers', '110g (4oz) kerrygold butter, now softer', '50g (2oz) peeled and finely chopped shallots', '1 clove garlic, peeled and finely chopped', '2 tsp chopped thyme leaves', '75ml (3fl oz) port', 'Salt and ground black pepper', 'Tomato salad, to serve', 'Melba toast, to serve']
